## IAdminService.UnlockUserAccount() method

Unlocks previously locked user account.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
UnlockUserAccount(ticket: Ticket, user: User): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ticket | <code>Ticket</code> | a ticket with a JSON Web Token of the user who would like to unlcok the user account. The owner of the token must have permissions to unlock user accounts. |
|  user | <code>User</code> | the user whose account is to be unlocked. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<void>`

a promise to unlock the user account.
